description:
We carefully crafted the modern look of poker and incorporated classic solitaire that everyone loves. Experience clear, easy-to-read cards, smooth animations, and well-matched sound effects in landscape view.

is a product different from traditional classic casual card games such as Spider Card or Pyramid Card.You can move cards with one touch or drag them to their destination. You can play simple draw 1 games where most games can win, or if you feel you can handle the challenge, try your luck with draw 3 and Vegas play mode.

Features:
-The game uses a deck of cards (52 cards). From the table, 28 cards are dealt to 7 big piles, and the number of each pile increases from left to right from 1 to 7. The top card faces up and the rest face down.
-The opening tables are:
7 elimination tablets,
4 sub-tables,
-Remaining decks and flipped decks.
-The purpose of the game is to eliminate all the cards in the deck and the remaining decks into Ace, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, Jack, Queen, King styles, and stack them completely on the secondary deck.

As a single player game, we have also improved the layout of the game interface so that you can see at a glance what card you started with. We have optimized the one-click refresh function for you. You can switch to novice at any time with a single click.

The game does not require any fees, there will be no recharge items, and it is completely free. Join the most popular card game of any age and play with your friends now!
